rounds.observation:
[GAME] Welcome to the Tic Tac Toe Arena! You are competing as Player 0.
Victory is achieved by claiming three consecutive squares in any direction: horizontal, vertical, or diagonal.
To make your move, choose a numbered position (0-8) on the grid and submit it in brackets.
Example: '[7]' will claim the bottom-right corner of the board.

Your battle symbol is 'O', while your opponent fights with 'X'.

[GAME] Current Board:

 0 | 1 | 2 
---+---+---
 3 | 4 | 5 
---+---+---
 6 | 7 | 8 

Available Moves: '[0]', '[1]', '[2]', '[3]', '[4]', '[5]', '[6]', '[7]', '[8]'

To make your move, choose a numbered position (0-8) on the grid and submit it in brackets.
Example: '[7]' will claim the bottom-right corner of the board.

Your battle symbol is 'X', while your opponent fights with 'O'.

 3 | 4 | 5 
---+---+---
 6 | 7 | 8 

Available Moves: '[0]', '[1]', '[2]', '[3]', '[4]', '[5]', '[6]', '[7]', '[8]'

rounds.response:
[Player 1] I see the threat: O has two in a row across the top (0 and 1). I must block the immediate win at cell 2.

[2]

rounds.response:
[Player 1] O has a possible three-in-a-row forming along the far-left column (cells 0 → 3 → 6). I need to block at cell 3 before O can finish the diagonal or vertical threat there:

[3]
